article_title: Health Fraud, Securities Prosecutor Joins Greenberg Traurig
article_text:
Health Fraud, Securities Prosecutor Joins Greenberg Traurig

Law360, New York (October 24, 2013, 6:02 PM ET) -- A former managing assistant U.S. attorney who has helmed criminal suits against home health agencies, hospitals, securities traders and others has joined Greenberg Traurig LLP as a shareholder in its white-collar defense department, the firm confirmed Thursday.



Felicia Manno spent 11 years as an AUSA out of Chicago, filing a raft of home health fraud and financial fraud cases, and started at Greenberg's Chicago office on Oct. 14. Manno decided to move to private practice after seeing a new market space opening in her areas of...

To view the full article, register now.
